quote: I know money isn't everything. but it certainly is something.
author: Thisuri Wanniarachchi,  COLOMBO STREETS

quote: Money. The ultimate motivation. The ultimate way of keeping score.
author: Michael Connelly,  Chasing the Dime

quote: When I have a little money, I buy books; and if I have any left, I buy food and clothes.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Poverty: a temporary financial low, curable by money.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Friendship and money: oil and water.
author: Mario Puzo

quote: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life; now that I am old I know that it is.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: You can be happy with money and you can be wretched with it. It depends on what kind of person you are. -- A Prologue to Love
author: Taylor Caldwell

quote: There is nothing around me but money, money, money.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: What good is money if it can't buy happiness?
author: Agatha Christie,  The Man in the Brown Suit

quote: You think money can solve any problem, but all it s good for is buying the things it can, and leaving you free to pursue the things it can't.
author: Ann Herendeen,  Phyllida and the Brotherhood of Philander : a Bisexual Regency Romance

quote: Money is not equal for all people. A strong personal brand adds more lift and leverage. One dollar from me may buy a soda from a car dealership, but one dollar from Justin Bieber may get him a Ferrari. And they'd pay him to drive away.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: To summarize, using money to motivate people can be a double-edged sword. For tasks that require cognitive ability, low to moderate performance-based incentives can help. But when the incentive level is very high, it can command too much attention and thereby distract the person’s mind with thoughts about the reward. This can create stress and ultimately reduce the level of performance.
author: Dan Ariely,  The Upside of Irrationality: The Unexpected Benefits of Defying Logic at Work and at Home

quote: Money cannot buy peace of mind. It cannot heal ruptured relationships, or build meaning into a life that has none.
author: Richard M. DeVos

quote: It’s not about working for money, it’s about having money work for you.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: To enjoy the magic of life, smile with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To help humanity, live with kindness and harmony.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To grow the power of an imagination, travel to see the world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: As much money and life as you could want! The two things most human beings would choose above all - the trouble is, humans do have a knack of choosing precisely those things that are worst for them.
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quote: Lotto If I won a million bucks in Lotto,I'd give it to Charity.Charity gives great head.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: The wealthier I get, the more money I will have to not have, because my goal in getting is giving, and nothing is better than charity.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Money is the most powerful and popular god because everybody is praying for money.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The lack of money is the root of all evil.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I don't need the money, dear. I work for art.
author: Maria Callas

quote: Sixty-four thousand dollars for a question, I hope they are asking you the meaning of life.
author: Paul Scofield

quote: A man wants to earn money in order to be happy, and his whole effort and the best of a life are devoted to the earning of that money. Happiness is forgotten; the means are taken for the end.
author: Albert Camus,  The Myth of Sisyphus and Other Essays

quote: When you have money in hand,only you forget who are you .But when you do not have any money in your hand,the whole world forget who you are.It's life.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden

quote: Money isn't everything...but it ranks right up there with oxygen.
author: Rita Davenport

quote: Gamble everything for love, if you're a true human being.
author: Rumi

quote: Money vs. Happiness [10w] Why do people with money say,'money can't buy happiness'?
author: Beryl Dov

quote: To see the beauty, love
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: So that the new generation that will be born can enjoy happiness. To pay the cost we will have to shoulder corpses and cross a river of blood(Riza Hawkeye -- Fullmetal Alchemist)
author: Hiromu Arakawa

quote: The More we value things, the less we value ourselves
author: Bruce Lee

quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
author: Judy Garland

quote: We buy things we don't need with money we don't have to impress people we don't like.
author: Dave Ramsey,  The Total Money Makeover: A Proven Plan for Financial Fitness

quote: It is a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Share your love, share you happiness, care for others; your wealth will be endless.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Lordy, lordy, lordy do I love money. It is a character flaw, no doubt, one that springs from a panicked childhood in which I always felt as if our family was only a couple missed child support payments from being tossed onto the pitiless streets of our suburban New Jersey town.
author: Michael Ian Black

quote: Knowledge is power is time is money.
author: Robert Thier,  Storm and Silence

quote: Money is not a motivating factor. Money doesn't thrill me or make me play better because there are benefits to being wealthy. I'm just happy with a ball at my feet. My motivation comes from playing the game I love. If I wasn't paid to be a professional footballer I would willingly play for nothing.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: What you get is a living, what you give is a life.
author: Lillian Gish

quote: To be immortal and then die
author: Jean-Luc Godard,  Breathless

quote: It’s the things you fight for and struggle with before earning that have the greatest worth.
author: Sarah Dessen,  Along for the Ride

quote: You can be young without money, but you can't be old without it.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Beauty is a whore, I like money better.
author: Michael Cunningham,  The Hours

quote: Mostly it is loss which teaches us about the worth of things.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer,  Parerga and Paralipomena

quote: Yes, I want money more than anything else in the world.”“Then you’ve made the only choice. But there’s a penalty attached, as there is to most things you want. It’s loneliness.
author: Margaret Mitchell,  Gone With the Wind

quote: On savings: A dollar here, a dollar there. Over time, it adds up to two dollars.
author: Jarod Kintz,  The Titanic would never have sunk if it were made out of a sink.
